SELECT A.STD_YYMM AS STD_YYMM , A.SEQ_NO AS SEQ_NO , A.ATIT_CD AS ATIT_CD , B.ATIT_ENG_NM AS ATIT_NM , A.INSU_PL_ITM_CD AS INSU_PL_ITM_CD , C.VLVL_DESC AS INSU_PL_ITM_NM , A.ACNT_AMT AS ACNT_AMT , A.INSU_PL_ITM_AMT AS INSU_PL_ITM_AMT , A.DIFF_AMT AS DIFF_AMT , D.USR_NM AS FRST_REG_EMP_NO , A.FRST_REG_DTM AS FRST_REG_DTM FROM TB_ACNT_RECT_LST AS A INNER JOIN TB_ATIT_MNG_LST AS B ON A.ATIT_CD = B.ATIT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CO_CD_DTLS_LST C ON A.INSU_PL_ITM_CD = C.VLVL_CD AND C.CD_ID = 'C0003' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_USR_MNG_LST D ON A.FNL_UPD_EMP_NO = D.USR_ID WHERE 1=1
